document.full_text: philippine president benigno aquino pledged on sunday to push for the passage of a reproductive health bill in congress as a tool to fight poverty even at the risk of excommunication from the roman catholic church.
document.title: manila's aquino risks church ire on contraception bill
lines_and_colors: philippine president benigno aquino pledged on sunday to push for the passage of a reproductive health bill in congress as a tool to fight poverty even at the risk of excommunication from the roman catholic church.
